# Joe Ben Taylor - Logo Designer, Web Designer & Developer

> Professional web designer and developer based in Doncaster, United Kingdom. Specializing in modern, performant websites built with Next.js, React, and cutting-edge animation techniques. Offering custom web design, development, and digital solutions.

## Services

- Web Design: Custom, modern website design tailored to your brand and goals
- Web Development: High-performance websites built with Next.js, React, and TypeScript
- Animation & Interactions: Advanced GSAP animations and smooth user experiences
- Portfolio Websites: Beautiful, showcase-ready portfolio sites for creatives and professionals
- E-commerce Solutions: Custom online stores and shopping experiences

## About

- Location: Doncaster, United Kingdom
- Expertise: Next.js, React, TypeScript, GSAP animations, DatoCMS
- Specialization: Modern, performant web experiences with attention to detail
